title: Add Ecosystem Discovery CLI Tool
description: Implement automated discovery service registry for SAP-001 v1.2 enabling repos to find each other by capability
background: Currently discovery is manual via capability registry YAML files. Repos must manually grep or search to find who provides specific capabilities. This doesn't scale beyond 5-10 repos.
rationale: Enable seamless repo discovery for coordination. Support the vision of 20+ repo ecosystem where agents can automatically find the right repo to coordinate with. Reduce friction in cross-repo collaboration.
